list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Where is volume fifteen of the encyclopedia?

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: What is the volume of the petrol tank?

list_definition.definition: level of sound eg on a radio, television etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Turn up the volume on the radio.
